column4: question... Ubuntu rocks, but kde (via kubuntu) isn't as tightly integrated as gnome... is that true, or am i missing something?
gnome is the stock wm - so it's to be expected gnome is more polished
best bet would be gimp - but as to auto straightening - that's a big ask
autostraighten isn't a big deal... bu ti mean, in windows, when i use the HP crap... it'll crop off the empty space
